name: Running With Scissors
description:
An infinite runner in which you play as some jerk who thinks it's funny to run around town cutting peoples' clothes off!

Items:
  • Small Scissors - 100 points
  • Big Scissors - 300 points
Actions:
  • Cut People's Clothes - 500 points
Controls:
  • Spacebar - Jump / Start
  • Left Mouse Click - Cut (When playing in a browser, make sure the mouse is within the box the game is running in.)
  • S - Slide
  • C (On start screen) - View credits
  • Esc - Exit
Credits
  • Brian Y - Pixel Art, Design
  • Jacob Sauerhoefer - Game Programming, Music
  • Earl P - Pixel Art, Design
  • Corbin P - Audio Engineering , Music
  • Zachary Singer - Game Programming, Pixel Art
  • Ron M Burgess - Game Programming

You can also find this game on my Teammate Ron's profile here: https://ronmburgess.itch.io/runningwithscissors
